title: Travel time to employment centres by mode of travel
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-transport
summary: Average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500 to 4,999 jobs available by public transport or walking, by cycle and by car (official statistics in development), England, 2014-2019.
description:
This dataset shows the average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500 to 4,999 jobs available by public transport or walking, by cycle and by car (official statistics in development), in England, for periods 2014-2019. 

### Coverage 

England

### Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities,
Metropolitan Counties,
Counties,
Regions,
Nation (England)

### Source

 - England: [Department for Transport](https://www.gov.uk/government/statistical-data-sets/journey-time-statistics-data-tables-jts) 


### Source Notes and Caveats 
Data is not available for 2018.
